review.reviewBody: one of the best Nepali momos (dumplings) in Vancouver. Jhol momo is perfection. great portions for the price.
very good!  great flavor!  well worth it!

The food was delicious,  but it took an hour and twenty minutes. 
The mild spicy was still quite spicy,  so if you are sensitive to spice,  be careful.
Delicious food with generous potion sizes!
Very tasty, generous portions, hot food every time. Fish Pakora was the best! Will order again for sure
